attributes.action: ask the BBC to resume the upshares downshares slot on the Radio 4 pm programme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The upshares/downshares slot provided an important service in communicating news about business and the economy in a simple manner. It was scrapped when it was announced that the UK economy had exited recession.

rejection.details: The BBC is independent of government. Please contact the BBC directly.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
